title: Detroit Institute of Bagels
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Take-out, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bagel shop and Jewish deli making classic and small-batch bagels and spreads plus sandwiches to-order. Three vegan suitable spreads (hummus, tahini-butternut squash, sriracha-lentil) and two vegan sandwiches. Large bright space, parking in rear and in front on street.
